prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with shimmering pink scales and intricate silver patterns.
Show me a legendary creature that has a majestic presence, combining elegance and power.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of space and time with celestial designs.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek, elongated body, adorned with radiant gems and intricate wings.
Design a mythical Pokemon that features a striking color palette of pink and silver, exuding grace.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that has both dragon and water characteristics, with a unique silhouette.
Make a Pokemon that appears to manipulate time and space, with ethereal features and a majestic aura.

distinctive_features: Unique spatial orbs around its body
